description.raw:
Prior to this change, all programs started `ign` have process names that are not convenient. Without this change `ign gazebo` has the following behavior.

1. 'top' will either show `ign` or something like `/usr/bin/ruby /home/nkoenig/local/bin/ign gazebo -v 4` depending on if you showing the command-line or program-line (this option can be toggled by pressing `c` when `top` is running).

2. `ps aux | grep ign` shows something like:

```
nkoenig  20563 20.6  0.3 1057188 60860 pts/6   Sl   08:08   0:31 /usr/bin/ruby /home/nkoenig/local/bin/ign gazebo -v 4
nkoenig  20566  118  1.3 3173704 225480 pts/6  Sl   08:08   2:59 /usr/bin/ruby /home/nkoenig/local/bin/ign gazebo -v 4
```


With this change running `ign gazebo` has the following behavior:

1. `top' will show `ign` or `ign gazebo` depending on whether you are showing command-line or program name. I recommend program name.

2. `ps aux | grep ign` show something like:

```
nkoenig  24578 20.9  0.3 1057188 60048 pts/6   Sl   08:13   0:12 ign gazebo
nkoenig  24581  123  1.3 3173708 224964 pts/6  Sl   08:13   1:13 ign gazebo
```
description.html:
Prior to this change, all programs started ign have process names that are not convenient. Without this change ign gazebo has the following behavior.

  1. 'top' will either show ign or something like /usr/bin/ruby /home/nkoenig/local/bin/ign gazebo -v 4 depending on if you showing the command-line or program-line (this option can be toggled by pressing c when top is running).

  2. ps aux | grep ign shows something like:

nkoenig  20563 20.6  0.3 1057188 60860 pts/6   Sl   08:08   0:31 /usr/bin/ruby /home/nkoenig/local/bin/ign gazebo -v 4
nkoenig  20566  118  1.3 3173704 225480 pts/6  Sl   08:08   2:59 /usr/bin/ruby /home/nkoenig/local/bin/ign gazebo -v 4

With this change running ign gazebo has the following behavior:

  1. top' will showignorign gazebo` depending on whether you are showing command-line or program name. I recommend program name.

  2. ps aux | grep ign show something like:

nkoenig  24578 20.9  0.3 1057188 60048 pts/6   Sl   08:13   0:12 ign gazebo
nkoenig  24581  123  1.3 3173708 224964 pts/6  Sl   08:13   1:13 ign gazebo
